meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>bustle</kanji> and <kanji>run</kanji> around all day from being busy you end up <vocabulary>running about</vocabulary> to get them all done. You'll <vocabulary>be busy</vocabulary> getting it all done, but your <vocabulary>efforts</vocabulary> won't be in vain!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
